LanguageData.ARA_Shell_Thorn.label: carapace spine
LanguageData.ARA_Shell_Thorn.description: Two rows of spines are implanted into the shell of the Arachne insect.If it is not in close combat, it will automatically fire spines at nearby enemies to attack.This surgery does not require the creation of any parts and can be performed directly on the Arachne insect.
